A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney was given an amazing opportunity to make something amazing and this was the biggest disappointment of the series.  I never thought something could make me feel worse than The Phantom Menace\, but this did.  So many plot holes\, the space race didn't make any sense\, Admiral Holdo was the worst\, this was just the most shallow shitty portrayal of the Star Wars universe since the holiday special.
